game.name: Waddle Paddle
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, 협동, 온라인 협동, 카메라 움직임 조정, 음량 개별 조정, 난이도 조정, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Paddle as a cute penguin through a difficult kayaking course, dodging deadly obstacles along the way. Take on the challenge solo or team up with a friend to paddle in sync toward the finish.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Paddle as a cute penguin through a difficult kayaking course, dodging deadly obstacles along the way. Take on the challenge solo or team up with a friend to paddle in sync toward the finish.
